Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到辐射效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到寒冷效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME COLD DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
As night falls, the temperature will fall. This will make any effects you feel from the cold even deadlier on you. I suggest finding warmth, and soon.
You fell in water. On a freezing world. Good job, idiot! Now you'll freeze to death ^red;twice as fast^reset;!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到炎热效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME HEAT DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs: 该星球没有氧气，如果强行停留，你将有可能窒息而亡！
Texts.Eng: It may be worth noting that this celestial body has no atmosphere and you will die without some sort of oxygen source.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到致命辐射效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME COLD DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到致命高温效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME HEAT DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

^red;WARNING! POISON ATMOSPHERE DETECTED ^reset;! 
With ^green;Proto-Poison protection^reset; you'll be fine. Otherwise, Proto poison slowly drains your vitality. Poison resistance reduces or nullifies the effects.

我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:

You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
